tit.e: Kunaicho Shikibushoku (the Board of the Ceremonies of Imperial Household Agency)
Kunaicho Shikibushoku (the Board of the Ceremonies of the Imperial Household Agency)
Kunaicho Shikibushoku (the Board of the Ceremonies of the Imperial Household Agency)

sen.j: 式部職（しきぶしょく）は宮内庁の内部部局のひとつ
sen.e: Shikibushoku is one of the departments of the Imperial Household Agency.
Shikibushoku is one of the departments of the Imperial Household Agency.
Shikibushoku is one of the departments of the Imperial Household Agency.

sen.j: 式部職の事務については宮内庁法第7条 が根拠。
sen.e: Office duties of the Shikibushoku are based on the seventh article of Imperial Household Agency Act.
Office duties of the Shikibushoku are based on the seventh article of the Imperial Household Agency Act.
Office duties of the Shikibushoku are based on the seventh article of the Imperial Household Agency Act.
Office duties in regard to ceremonies
Office duties in regard to ceremonies

Office duties in regard to association
Office duties in regard to association
Office duties in regard to association
Office duties in regard to gagaku (ancient Japanese court dance and music)
Office duties in regard to gagaku (ancient Japanese court dance and music)
Office duties in regard to gagaku (ancient Japanese court dance and music)
Grand Master of the Ceremonies
Grand Master of the Ceremonies
Grand Master of the Ceremonies
A person in charge of the Shikibushoku.
A person in charge of the Shikibushoku.
A person in charge of the Shikibushoku.
Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies
Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies
Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies

sen.j: 皇室の儀式を担当する式部副長と国際親善を担当する式部副長がそれぞれおかれる。
sen.e: One Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of ceremonies in the imperial court, and the other Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of international goodwill.
One Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of ceremonies in the imperial court, and the other Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of international goodwill.
One Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of ceremonies in the Imperial Family, and the other Vice-Grand Master of the Ceremonies is in charge of international goodwill.
sen.cmt: 皇室→Imperial Family としました。

sen.e: Official responsible for court ceremonies
Official responsible for court ceremonies
Official responsible for court ceremonies

sen.j: 雅楽の演奏・演舞を担当しているが、宮中晩餐会などで演奏されるクラシック音楽も担当している。
sen.e: The section is in charge of playing not only gagaku but also classic music in a banquet at the Imperial Palace.
The section is in charge of playing not only gagaku but also classic music in a banquet at the Imperial Palace.
The section is in charge of playing not only gagaku but also classic music in a banquet at the Imperial Palace.

sen.j: 楽部の首席楽長、楽長、楽長補、楽師は重要無形文化財保持者に認定される。
sen.e: Shuseki gakucho (grand master of music), Gakucho (master of music), Gakuchoho (sub master of music), and Gakushi (musician) are entitled to the holders of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Tresure).

Shuseki gakucho (grand master of music), Gakucho (master of music), Gakuchoho (sub master of music), and Gakushi (musician) are entitled to the holders of Important Intangible Cultural Properties (Living National Treasure).

Shuseki gakucho (grand master of music), Gakucho (master of music), Gakuchoho (sub master of music), and Gakushi (musician) are entitled to the holders of Important Intangible Cultural Properties (Living National Treasure).

sen.j: 職員(楽生)は中学入学から9年間の修行を経て、一人前になる。
sen.e: Staff (Gakusei) becomes full-fledged after nine-year training since entering a junior high school.
Staff (Gakusei) becomes full-fledged after nine-year training since entering a junior high school.
Staff (Gakusei) becomes full-fledged after nine-year training since entering a junior high school.

sen.j: かつては、東儀氏、上氏、園氏等の世襲職であった。
sen.e: The positions used to be heredity successions of the Togi clan, the Ue clan, the Sono clan, and the like.
The positions used to be heredity successions of the Togi clan, the Ue clan, the Sono clan, and the like.
